articles.title: Live updates: Latest news on Russia and the war in Ukraine - CNBC
articles.description: Russian drone strikes on Kharkiv killed at least four people, including three rescue workers, and injured 12 more, according to Ukrainian officials.
articles.content:
Russian drone strikes on Kharkiv early Friday morning killed at least four people, including three rescue workers, and injured 12 more, according to Ukrainian officials.

articles.title: Nothing teases new earbuds launching in April; two more phones coming this year - 9to5Google
articles.description: Nothing is set to launch two new smartphones in 2024, but a new set of earbuds before that at an April event.
articles.content:
Nothing is teasing the launch of its next set of earbuds while two more phones seem to be on the docket as well.
